description: An official register entry is a record of an entity being on an official register, for example a charity register, register of minority owned businesses, or an official list of government contractors, etc -- Q could there be multiple register entries per registration ... how do we cope with this

identifier_code_system.description: If the register uses a recognised code system - e.g. tax numbers as unique identifiers â€“ list this identifier code system here, e.g. us_fein (US Federal tax number). See identifier schema for details

register_uid.description: the unique identifier on the register

start_date.description: The date the entity was registered

end_date.description: The date the entity was de-registered

source_url.description: Place where this fact can be verified

sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (usually date this information was retrieved from the source)

retrieved_at.description: Date-time this was retrieved from the source

register_entry_url.description: A public URL for the register entry

status.description: The status of the register entry

other_attributes.description: Use for other register entry attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes
